ability.Hellfire Metabolism: This Pokemon's Special Attack increases by 1 stage when it uses a Fire-type move, but takes damage equal to 1/16 of its max HP.
ability.Volatile Flame: This Pokemon's Fire-type attacks have a 50% chance to cause an explosion to the target, dealing additional damage of 1/16 of its max HP.

Poison Vents.effect: Has a 30% chance to poison the target.

Explosive Strike.effect: Deals additional damage equal to 10% of the target's max HP, but the user takes 10% of its own max HP as recoil.

Gas Cloud.effect: Creates a gas cloud in the opponent's field that lasts for 2 turns, lowering the accuracy of all non-Poison-type Pokemon by 1 stage each end of the turn.
